title: Getting started
content:
Add any of these lines to your build.sbt:
// On JVM libraryDependencies += "io.github.pityka" %% "nspl-awt" % "0.1.0+7-9da18351-SNAPSHOT" // In browser, using the canvas renderer libraryDependencies += "io.github.pityka" %%% "nspl-canvas-js" % "0.1.0+7-9da18351-SNAPSHOT" // Dependencies #   nspl-awt depends on vectorgraphics2d nspl-canvas-js has no external dependencies besides the scalajs-dom from the Scala Js project.  Example: #  import scala.io.Source
